name: CodeMirror "Elegant" [Stylish editor]
description: Elegant is one of CodeMirror's stock style sheets, adapted to Firefox's implementation. Firefox 27+ only. Because of a Firefox+CodeMirror bug this isn't displayed quite like the original Elegant - tags are not red in the original, for example. The original is here, if you wish to compare.
additional_info: More CodeMirror styles CodeMirror's stock style sheets all neglect to style one element of the editor or another, relying on the default browser style (black text, white background, etc.) to fill in the gaps. Firefox though applies its own editor style sheet, one that styles every bit of the editor, which means some of the Firefox peeks through the stock CodeMirror styles, and the result isn't always good. CodeMirror: Theme demo (showing Javascript, unfortunately, not CSS)
